resources.string: This prototype application is developed for the municipality of Gordexola.
Are you sure you want to close the application?
This application needs location data with High Accuracy (GPS, Wi-fi, and mobile networks) in order to work correctly. Do you want to enable it?
It is recommendend for the first time to run the app with Wifi because about XXX MBytes will be downloaded
This application needs internet in order to work correctly. Please turn on your internet connection.
I have turned my internet on
